amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce Executive Order 13502 which mandates project labor agreements (PLA's) on projects that are worth $25 million or more.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce Executive Order 13502, the FAR Council supporting regulations FAR Rule 2009-005, or any agency memorandum, bulletin, or contracting policy that derives its authority for Executive Order 13502 or FAR Rule 2009-005.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 213 (Roll no. 396).
